context: I'm good. What kind of movies do you like best?
This weekend reminds me of the movie Memorial Day (2012). Have you seen it?
No, but it would be the right weekend to see it. Maybe it's on TV.
Hmm. Maybe. Do you like comedies? A classic comedy is Groundhog Day (1993).
resp: I love Groundhog Day! I watch it every year. Do you like National Lampoon's Vacation (1983)? Another classic comedy.
